mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_mt_feed_custom_prop ( `channel_id`, `feed_cat_path`, `feed_prop_original`, `feed_prop_translation`, `display_order`, `created`, `creater`, `modified`, `modifier` ) VALUES( #{channelId}, #{feedCatPath}, #{feedPropOriginal}, #{feedPropTranslation}, #{displayOrder}, now(), #{creater}, now(), #{creater} )
